article:
The Arthurian legend featured many characters, including the Knights of the
Round table and members of his family. Their names often differed from version
to version and from language to language. The following is a list of them with
descriptions. (Note: The ' â  ' symbol indicates a Knight of the Round Table.)

{| class="wikitable"
|-
